name: SPOJENY
description:
An arcade space shooter made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.

Take control of a spaceship in a very hostile environment. Join your ship controls together for maximum combat efficiency and battle wicked space pirates!

Control your ship using WASD or arrow keys. Press SPACE to open/close the controls menu and connect different control elements together.

PRO TIP: You must join shields or guns to the UP, RIGHT or LEFT keys in order for them to function.

Sound effects from Kenney.nl

Leave a comment if you want, it would be highly appreciated ;)
